item.title: Vernix-PKz Yell
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I know, I just comment things out from habit. If I think I may use it later on, I comment it out. If you don’t have a system for doing things it can get chaotic. But ofc it doesn’t take a lot to remember that.

Read full topic

item.title: Vernix-PKz Yell
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:3, topic:478491”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=596716.msg4201678#msg4201678 date=1358288628]
get rid of the c.getplayerRights == 0. That is not needed if you want everyone to be able to do it
[/quote]
Comment it out*[/quote]
Commenting something out uses // for a whole line or /* */ for a certain section of a code. It makes it so you don’t need to rewrite the code that you have written if you don’t want it or something is wrong with it. Removing the rights would making it look cleaner and it doesn’t take much to remember c.playerRights.

Read full topic
